trans-unit.source: Complete the following prerequisites before you use <token>firstref_acs</token>:
trans-unit.target: Complete the following prerequisites before you use <token>firstref_acs</token>:

trans-unit.source: To use <token>secondref_acs</token>, you must create a project and add one or more namespaces to it.
trans-unit.target: To use <token>secondref_acs</token>, you must create a project and add one or more namespaces to it.

trans-unit.source: <token>secondref_acs</token> is compatible with any modern web platform, including .NET, PHP, Python, Java, and Ruby.
trans-unit.target: <token>secondref_acs</token> is compatible with any modern web platform, including .NET, PHP, Python, Java, and Ruby.

trans-unit.source: <token>secondref_acs</token> can be accessed from applications that run on almost any operating system or platform that can perform HTTPS operations.
trans-unit.target: <token>secondref_acs</token> can be accessed from applications that run on almost any operating system or platform that can perform HTTPS operations.

trans-unit.source: Make sure the following programs are installed and functioning properly on your computer:
trans-unit.target: Make sure the following programs are installed and functioning properly on your computer:

trans-unit.source: For more information about Visual Studio, see <externalLink><linkText>Microsoft Visual Studio</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=213023</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about Visual Studio, see <externalLink><linkText>Microsoft Visual Studio</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=213023</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework 4 or .NET Framework 3.5 SP1 with the updates in Microsoft Knowledge Base articles <externalLink><linkText>976126</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=213024</linkUri></externalLink> or <externalLink><linkText>976127</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=213025</linkUri></externalLink> applied.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 4 or .NET Framework 3.5 SP1 with the updates in Microsoft Knowledge Base articles <externalLink><linkText>976126</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=213024</linkUri></externalLink> or <externalLink><linkText>976127</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=213025</linkUri></externalLink> applied.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>Description of Windows Identity Foundation</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=213027</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>Description of Windows Identity Foundation</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=213027</linkUri></externalLink>.
